title: 願榮光歸香港 英文二次創作 邀virtual合唱 (有demo)

replies.msg:
DEMO & MV：
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mazRA5PRAlM

詞我只會向合作朋友免費開放版權
請唔好係我出正式版前公開發佈任何自己整o既版本，否則當翻版
Target 928前出正式合唱版
整呢個版本係因為覺得香港人需要一個適合普遍英文水平能聽得明 唱得掂o既版本~
非常感謝其他創作者既其他英文版本!

Virtual合唱參加者請把網名，tg id，同冇音樂/雜聲的人聲唱歌錄音file send去 hkglory721831@gmail.com .
Deadline 23:59 25th Sep 2019

音樂： https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e1Qy-WHErOE
感謝DGX團隊創作~

我有絕對權利篩選整正式版既聲音，最多揀5男5女，極權，冇普選。
女仔請唱高8度，唱和音可以同時submit 主音 and 和音。
如果超過15人交聲音，我會整個唔篩選大集匯。

English Lyrics: lain-R
English Vocal Demo: lain-R

何以 這土地 淚再流
Our tears shed again on this land
何以 令眾人 亦憤恨
The anguish is burning every one
昂首 拒默沉 吶喊聲 響透
Together we stand, Outcrying hand in hand!
盼自由 歸於 這裡
Freedom belongs to Hong Kong

何以 這恐懼 抹不走
Though we're threatened by sound of fear
何以 為信念 從沒退後
We never retreat for our belief
何解 血在流 但邁進聲 響透
Some fallen in blood, but we're still marching on
建自由 光輝 香港
Freedom will shine in Hong Kong

在晚星 墜落 徬徨午夜
When the stars vanishing in the night
迷霧裡 最遠處吹來 號角聲
In the mist, we hear the sound of Rallying Cry
捍自由 來齊集這裡 來全力抗對
Stand with us, with virtuous minds, for glory and pride,
勇氣 智慧 也永不滅
our courage never ever dies.

黎明來到 要光復 這香港
Let us recover Hong Kong Dusk till Dawn
同行兒女 為正義 時代革命
This is our time! Fight for Justice of Hong Kong!
祈求 民主與自由 萬世都不朽
Wishing Democracy and Freedom standing strong!
我願榮光歸香港
Glory to Our Land - Hong Kong



Anyone who wants to participate in the choir version, please email your recorded voice file to hkglory721831@gmail.com. I need that voice clip to have your voice only with no background music and no other noise. The deadline will be HK Time 23:59 25th Sep 2019. Be aware that I have the absolute right to pick who can be included in the final choir version (less than 10). If there are too many contributors. I will also make one version that has everyone's voice.

The background music I used is 《Glory to Hong Kong》International & Instrumental Edition:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e1Qy-WHErOE

You must follow the tempo that I sang in this demo.
Girls, please sing 1 octave higher than my voice.
If you know how to sing as a backing vocalist (和音), you are welcome to send me a backing voice recording, or both.

Original Formal March Cantonese Version:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YxptkMBYk2A

[和理非行動升級］928維港全民放輕汽球
https://lih.kg/1588211
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區

［行動］929細節出左了 唔該文宣 推爆佢
https://lih.kg/1587564

話時話聽到好多人唱咗「在晚星 墮落...」
係墜落呀！
[音：聚]
而唔係讀折墮個墮呀
希望同dgx傾下揀個 or 執埋執埋合體一個official英文出黎~
